home.hero_title: Bridging Guinea & Russia Through Premium Trade
home.hero_text: Specializing in the export of high-quality Guinean oils, coffee beans, cacao beans, and nuts to Russia, and the import of Russian wheat seeds, soaps, and onions to Guinea.

about.section_subtitle: Connecting markets through trusted trade relationships
about.about_text1: AfroEuro Trade Bridge specializes in facilitating premium agricultural trade between Guinea and Russia. Founded by professionals with deep roots in both countries, we leverage our unique understanding of both markets to create valuable trade opportunities.
about.about_text2: Our team in Guinea ensures direct access to the highest quality agricultural products, while our Russian operations guarantee efficient distribution and market penetration.
about.about_text3: We pride ourselves on ethical sourcing, transparent operations, and building long-term partnerships with both suppliers and buyers.
about.feature1_text: Direct partnerships with producers in Guinea and distributors in Russia ensure quality and reliability.
about.feature2_text: We specialize in premium agricultural goods sourced directly from their origins.
about.feature3_text: Streamlined import/export processes ensuring timely delivery of goods.
about.feature4_text: Creating economic opportunities for both Guinean producers and Russian buyers.

products.section_subtitle: Premium agricultural goods from Guinea and Russia
products.coffee_desc: High-quality Arabica beans grown in the rich volcanic soil of Guinea's highlands.
products.cacao_desc: Organic cacao beans with rich flavor profile, perfect for premium chocolate production.
products.palm_oil_desc: Cold-pressed, unrefined palm oil with rich nutrients and vibrant color.
products.nuts_desc: High-quality cashews and other nuts sourced from Guinea's fertile regions.
products.wheat_desc: High-yield, disease-resistant wheat seeds suitable for African growing conditions.
products.soap_desc: Natural, handmade soaps using traditional Russian methods and ingredients.
products.onion_desc: High-quality storage onions with excellent shelf life and flavor profile.

contact.section_subtitle: Get in touch for quotes, orders, and partnership opportunities
contact.get_in_touch_desc: Have questions about our products or services? Reach out to our team for more information or to request a quote.
contact.thank_you: Thank you for your inquiry! We will contact you shortly.
contact.validation_error: Please fill in all required fields.
contact.email_error: Please enter a valid email address.
contact.phone_error: Please enter a valid phone number.
